short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily search for kanji words to see their meanings, stroke order ...etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps Japanese learners (especially Kanji). 
If you see a kanji character that you don't recognise, select it, then right click, then you'll see a "Kanji Search" item in the content menu. Clicking this item, will take you to https://jisho.org/ where you can see the meanings of the words, the stroke order and a lot more. 

The extension adds a hot key as well (Ctrl+Shift+K or Cmd+Shift+K) which selects any selected text and does the same.
